a-input/addonAfter.description: The label text displayed after (on the right side of) the input field.

a-input/addonBefore.description: The label text displayed before (on the left side of) the input field.

a-input/prefix.description: The prefix icon for the Input.

a-input/size.description: The size of the input box. Note: in the context of a form, the large size is used. Available: large default small

a-input/suffix.description: The suffix icon for the Input.

a-input/type.description: The type of input, see: MDN(use Input.TextArea instead of type="textarea")
